body_html:
That's not an actual error, there's should be more info about the true
error from the child script.

There was similar configuration problem in the SO question below, solved by
doing bazel clean

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38794497/tensorflow-bazel-0-3-0-build-cuda-8-0-gtx-1070-fails/38795005#comment64963046_38795005

On Tue, Aug 9, 2016 at 5:47 PM, patfla notifications@github.com wrote:

Hmm - installed all of 8.0. The build gets much further but then this:

patfla@patfla-N550JV:~/code/tensorflow$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /home/patfla/code/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:199:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer' failed: crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed: error executing command third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc -o bazel-out/local_linux-opt/bin/tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer ... (remaining 805 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.

crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed

—
You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#3699 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AABaHNuJAucUutnv8tFiVzUMal8vZf_lks5qeR-MgaJpZM4JfT_W
.

body:
That's not an actual error, there's should be more info about the true
error from the child script.

There was similar configuration problem in the SO question below, solved by
doing `bazel clean`

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38794497/tensorflow-bazel-0-3-0-build-cuda-8-0-gtx-1070-fails/38795005#comment64963046_38795005

On Tue, Aug 9, 2016 at 5:47 PM, patfla notifications@github.com wrote:

> Hmm - installed all of 8.0. The build gets much further but then this:
> 
> patfla@patfla-N550JV:~/code/tensorflow$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
> INFO: Found 1 target...
> ERROR: /home/patfla/code/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:199:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer' failed: crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed: error executing command third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc -o bazel-out/local_linux-opt/bin/tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer ... (remaining 805 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
> 
> crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed
